description:
Bonobono and Chipmunk are once again going to take a walk with Chipmunk`s dad. Bonobono likes walks, so he gets along well with Chipmunk`s dad. You can go where you want, turn where you want, and stop where you like. Walks are great! Chipmunk has had enough and presses them about why walks are so fun.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Boku wa Sanpo ga Suki Da naa
ボクは散歩が好きだなぁ
